name: The Maize
description:
11/02/2023: The game is currently unfinished. There is no playable ending yet. (more details in the devlog)

 ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a short RPGMaker game made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2023.

Eric and his friends had always dreamed of living in the Upper City. In order to achieve that dream, they need to pass the Test: grow a Maize and harvest it in 7 Days.

 ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Content Warning: Blood, Verbal/Physical Violence, Abuse/Implied Abuse

 ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Art, Writing by Molybdän
Sound Effects from RPGMaker
Created in RPGMaker MV
